doc:
Clayne Crawford https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clayne_Crawford 0 Clayne Crawford (born April 20, 1978) is an American actor. He is best known for portraying the role of Martin Riggs on the Fox action comedy-drama television series Lethal Weapon (2016–2018). He also portrayed Teddy Talbot on the critically acclaimed Sundance drama Rectify (2013–2016). Crawford had supporting roles in the films A Walk to Remember (2002) and Swimfan (2002). He also appeared in A Love Song for Bobby Long (2004) and The Great Raid (2005). He also played in some small independent films that were not widely distributed. Clayne_Crawford ( born April_20_,_1978 ) is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for portraying the_role of Martin_Riggs on the_Fox_action_comedy-drama_television_series_Lethal_Weapon_(_2016 – 2018_) . He also portrayed Teddy_Talbot on the_critically_acclaimed_Sundance_drama_Rectify_(_2013 – 2016_) . Crawford had_supporting roles in the_films A Walk_to_Remember (_2002_)_and_Swimfan_(_2002_) . He also appeared in A_Love_Song for Bobby_Long_(_2004_) and The_Great_Raid_(_2005_) . He also played in some_small_independent_films that were_not_widely_distributed .
